alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 16 at 10:06AM EDT until March 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Minor flooding continues on the Wabash River at New Harmony. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage later today. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 7.1 feet Sunday, March 26. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
